statements: SELECT user_id, interaction_type, item_id, timestamp FROM user_interactions;
SELECT item_id, user_id, timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE item_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_interaction FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, item_id, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY item_id ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id ASC, interaction_type DESC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE product_category = 'electronics'
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2 AND recommendation_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING interaction_count > 3
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_data FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE 'click%' AND interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT user_id, product_name FROM user_interactions JOIN recommendations ON user_interactions.user_id = recommendations.user_id JOIN products ON recommendations.recommended_product_id = products.product_id WHERE product_category = 'electronics';

SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, product_name FROM user_interactions JOIN recommendations ON user_interactions.user_id = recommendations.user_id JOIN products ON recommendations.recommended_product_id = products.product_id WHERE user_id = 2 AND interaction_timestamp >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) as total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, action FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, recommended_item, timestamp FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE action = 'like';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY date_joined DESC
SELECT interaction_id, action, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, recommended_item FROM recommendations WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(recommended_item) AS recommendations_count FROM recommendations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(recommended_item) > 5
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT item_id, item_name, category, price FROM items WHERE price > 100;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT recommendation_id, item_id, user_id, recommendation_score FROM recommendations WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, price FROM items WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT recommendation_id, item_name, recommendation_score FROM recommendations JOIN items ON recommendations.item_id = items.item_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, purchase_date, amount FROM purchases WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registered_at > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY registered_at DESC;

SELECT users.username, purchases.amount, products.product_name FROM users INNER JOIN purchases ON users.user_id = purchases.user_id INNER JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE purchases.amount > 100 ORDER BY purchases.amount DESC;

SELECT interactions.interaction_type, recommendations.recommendation_score, users.username, products.product_name FROM interactions INNER JOIN recommendations ON interactions.user_id = recommendations.user_id INNER JOIN users ON interactions.user_id = users.user_id INNER JOIN products ON recommendations.product_id = products.product_id WHERE interaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC, interaction_timestamp ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT u.username, p.product_name, r.recommendation_score FROM users u INNER JOIN purchases pu ON u.user_id = pu.user_id INNER JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN recommendations r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' AND pu.amount > 500 ORDER BY r.recommendation_score DESC, pu.amount DESC;
